examples.example: 一串串葡萄挂在葡萄架上，在阳光的照耀下显得格外诱人。

translate.english: Bunches of grapes are hanging on the grape trellis, looking extremely attractive under the sunlight.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起去果园采摘葡萄，那欢乐的场景至今让我难忘。

translate.english: I went to the orchard to pick grapes with my friends, and the joyful scene still makes me unforgettable till now.

examples.example: 我和家人围坐在一起品尝着美味的葡萄，享受着温馨的时光。

translate.english: I and my family sit around and taste the delicious grapes, enjoying the warm time.
